name: Univar Solutions Inc.
description: Univar Solutions Inc., together with its subsidiaries, distributes chemicals and ingredients worldwide...
address: 123 Main St, Suite 200, Downers Grove, IL 60515
sustainabilityApproach: Univar Solutions is committed to sustainability...
awardsAndRecognitions: Responsible Care Distributor of the Year
International Chemical Distributor of the Year
innovation: Invests in research and development to create advanced chemical solutions for various industries.
expansionStrategy: Acquisition of regional chemical distributors and entering new markets to strengthen its global presence.
researchFacilities: The Solution Center in Houston, Texas
The Innovation Center in Tarrytown, New York
safetyStandards: Emphasizes on process safety, transportation safety, and workplace safety in compliance with industry regulations.
communityInvolvement: Supports local educational initiatives, disaster relief efforts, and community development projects.
supplierDiversity: Promotes diverse suppliers by providing equal opportunities to minority, women, and veteran-owned businesses.
employeeDevelopment: Offers comprehensive training programs, professional development opportunities, and career advancement paths for its workforce.
customerSupport: Dedicated customer service team and technical experts to assist with product selection, formulation, and regulatory compliance.
logisticsCapabilities: Extensive distribution network, including strategically located warehouses and transportation fleet to ensure efficient delivery of products.
qualityManagement: ISO 9001 certified, adhering to stringent quality control processes and continuous improvement practices.
environmentalInitiatives: Reduction of greenhouse gas emissions, waste minimization, and responsible use of resources.
corporateGovernance: Board of Directors and executive management team focused on long-term value creation, risk management, and ethical conduct.
supplierRelationships: Long-term partnerships with leading global chemical manufacturers to provide a comprehensive product portfolio.
globalReach: Operations in more than 60 countries across North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.
regulatoryExpertise: In-house regulatory experts to assist customers with navigating complex chemical regulations and industry standards.
proprietarySoftware: Custom-built enterprise resource planning (ERP) and supply chain management systems to optimize operations.
collaborativeInnovation: Works closely with customers to develop tailored solutions for their unique business needs.
globalSourcingCapabilities: Sources high-quality raw materials and ingredients from reputable suppliers worldwide.
safetyCulture: Strong safety culture driven by continuous training, safety audits, and sharing best practices across the organization.
sustainablePackaging: Implements initiatives to minimize packaging waste and promote the use of recyclable materials.
energyManagement: Focuses on energy efficiency and renewable energy sources to reduce the company's environmental footprint.
wasteManagement: Adheres to waste management practices that prioritize recycling, reuse, and recovery of materials.
responsibleProductStewardship: Ensures the safe handling, use, and disposal of chemicals throughout their life cycle.
skillDevelopmentInitiatives: Encourages employees to learn and develop new skills through mentorship programs, workshops, and online learning resources.
diversityAndInclusion: Promotes a diverse and inclusive work environment by fostering a culture of respect, open communication, and equal opportunities.
ethicalSourcing: Committed to ethical sourcing practices and ensuring suppliers meet high standards of environmental and social responsibility.
codeOfConduct: Establishes guidelines for ethical behavior, including anti-corruption, fair competition, and respect for human rights.
